policies.involuntary_refund:
allowed when:
  • PAL cancels a flight
  • Schedule changes ≥2 hours
  • PR ↔ PR or PR ↔ OAL connection breaks MCT by <2 hrs
• Full refund of unused sectors or full ticket if no segments used
• Endorsement Box: INVOL DUE PR____/(flight date) (XLD or SC)
• 24-hour full refund allowed if booking was made ≥7 days before departure
• Voluntary refunds allowed per fare rules, with applicable penalties
• Refund must be requested within ticket validity + 30 days
policies.involuntary_reissue:
• Reissue allowed under IRROPS if:
  • Rebook earlier (within 3 days)
  • Or rebook later (within 60 days)
  • Must remain in same booking class (BCC); if not available → confirm with PR
• Agents must follow endorsement box format
• All EMDs associated with reissued tickets must also be reissued
policies.voluntary_refund:
▪ Voluntary refunds are allowed as per applicable fare rules.
▪ Refund amount includes unused base fare and applicable unused taxes and fees, excluding non-refundable surcharges or service fees.
▪ Refund must be requested within ticket validity + 30 days.
▪ If passenger is not affected by schedule change, cancellation, or other IRROPs, penalties and refund restrictions apply per fare rules.
▪ Tickets partially used or expired are non-refundable unless required by local law.
▪ Refund of airport taxes is permitted on fully unused or expired tickets, if not previously claimed.
▪ Duplicate bookings: Refunds allowed if proof of full payment is provided and request is made within 24 hours.
▪ Refunds will be processed to the original form of payment (OFP), except cash may be refunded as a PAL voucher.
▪ For third-party bookings, refund may require coordination with issuing agent.
▪ All refund requests are subject to PAL’s Tariffs, Conditions of Carriage, and local laws and regulations.
policies.medical_refund:
• No waiver needed if IRROPS meets auto-approved triggers (≥2h delay, canceled flight, broken PR–OAL MCT)
• Any reissue outside of policy requires waiver from PR Rep
• Without waiver, ADM will be issued
policies.name_change:
✅ Reissues allowed for:
• Free if name order (surname/given) is transposed
• $25 fee for:
  • 1–3 letter corrections
  • Add/remove 'Maria' or 'Ma.'
  • Title corrections (MR/MS)
  • Duplicate name cleanup
🚫 Must go through PR Direct:
• Maiden/married name change
• Adding second surname
• A.K.A. inclusions
• DOB and passport must match after correction
• Used tickets: legal reasons only
• All EMDs must be reissued
policies.group_booking:
• Minimum 10 passengers
• $100 non-refundable deposit per person
• Names and TSA docs due 30 days before departure
• 10% group size reduction allowed
• Tickets issued 60 days before travel
• No name changes after issuance (only corrections with $25 fee)
• Round-trip required for group rate eligibility
policies.infant_policy:
• Infants must be at least 16 days old
• Infant must sit on adult lap or occupy paid seat if using car seat
• Infant fare may not include full baggage allowance
• Infants allowed in group bookings (at standard infant rate)
policies.baggage_policy:
• Free baggage allowance defined by route and ticket class
• Excess baggage subject to weight, dimension, and availability restrictions
• Do not include valuables, passports, electronics, or business documents in checked bags
• Special declaration of value accepted for checked bags (fee applies)
• Delay/loss/damage claims must follow formal PAL process; unchecked baggage claims not honored without fault by PAL
policies.seat_request_policy:
• Advance seat selection possible via PAL reservation system
• Special service and seat requests: via PAL or GDS-supported SSR codes
• Service animal seating, PRM assistance, and paid seat upgrades governed by ticket class and availability
• Group seats finalized 30 days before departure
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
• Voids allowed same day of issuance
• After same day, apply refund per fare rule with endorsement: INVOL or SC as needed
• If void fails in GDS, agent must request support with full PNR + ticket info
